::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

The Maximals wat as Radistor retreats, but they all notice it is in the
wrong direction. The all wounder where he is going. It is Hot Rod who
figures it out.
"Oh no! Guys, he is heading towards Maximal City!"
Cleder opens his commlink to all bots at Maxial City.
"This is Cleder at the Chiviton base. The gestalt, Radistor, is heading
towards Maximal City. Be on full alert! Hot Rod, my self, and the other
will try to slow him down."

They all head after him shooting, although their weapons had not had
much effect during the battle. Hot Rod transformes to sports car mode,
and drives ahead of Radistor. He shoots four missiles back at the
gestalt.
